errors.error_description: The link to the license file is broken. It points to a file named `LICENSE` instead of the correct `LICENSE.md`, resulting in a "File not found" error.
correction_candidates: Change the link to point to the project's `pyproject.toml` where the license is declared.
Change the link to a relative path: `LICENSE.md`.
Change the link to the BSD 3-Clause license text on the OSI website.
